action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi there,

We're here to bring you the latest product updates from The Events Calendar. Read below for all of the details.
See all release notes

⚙️ Product Updates for January and February 2025

The Events Calendar and Add-ons

Event Tickets Plus 6.1.5.1

This version of Event Tickets Plus hardened the API around ticket and attendee creation, editing, and deletion.

Event Tickets 5.19.1.2

The latest update of Event Tickets hardened the API around ticket and attendee creation, editing, and deletion.

Community 5.0.5.1

The latest Community version corrects an issue where split payments weren't working due to a missing PayPal library.

The Events Calendar 6.10.1.1

The latest update of The Events Calendar updates common library to correct issues with notifications around licensing.

Event Tickets 5.19.1.1

The latest update of Event Tickets updates common library to correct issues with notifications around licensing.

Event Schedule Manager 1.2.2

This version of Event Schedule Manager resolves the sponsor name not displaying in conference schedules when no image is set for the sponsor.

Event Tickets Plus 6.1.5

This version of Event Tickets Plus adds a check for the correct return type for `hijack_ticket_link` & ORDER BY clause in order queries for events that were created through WooCommerce to avoid possible randomness.

Event Tickets 5.19.1

The latest update of Event Tickets includes fixes to stop caching, correct row calculation in seat selection, and ticket price overwrite.

Events Calendar Pro 7.4.1

This latest version of Events Calendar Pro includes a preemptive update postmeta before 3rd parties to prevent metadata duplication.

The Events Calendar 6.10.1

The latest update of The Events Calendar introduces support for additional fields in Events REST API.

Stay Awesome,
Nathan B. Weller

The Events Calendar Team 🤘

You're receiving this because you purchased a product or opted in to marketing
communications from The Events Calendar

Sent to: support@wolfiq.com.au

Unsubscribe

The Events Calendar, 2703 Ena Drive , Lansing, MI 48917, United States
